acceptOwner().details: Can only be called by the pending owner to ensure correctness. Calls to the `_beforeAcceptOwner` hook      to perform logic before updating ownership.

pause().details: Can only be called by the pauser

unpause().details: Can only be called by the pauser

params.newEnabled: The new status of the operator

updatePauser(address).details: Can only be called by the current owner

updatePendingOwner(address).details: Can only be called by the current owner      New owner does not take affect until that address calls `acceptOwner()`

_markets.details: Registry of created markets by oracle and payoff      Note: address(0) is used in place of the deprecated payoff provider field

operators.details: Mapping of allowed operators for each account

referralFee.details: The referreral fee level for each referrer

acceptOwner().notice: Accepts and transfers the ownership of the contract to the pending owner

create((address,address)).notice: Creates a new market market with the given definition

instances(address).notice: Returns whether the instance is valid

updateOperator(address,bool).notice: Updates the status of an operator for the caller

updateReferralFee(address,uint256).notice: Updates the referral fee for a referrer

userdoc.notice: Manages creating new markets and global protocol parameters.
